To get started, please register a webCoRE instance by following the instructions below, or, if you have an account, please log in.

NOTE: An account is not required to use webCoRE.

Please open the SmartThings app on your phone and go to the Automations tab, then select the SmartApps section and find the webCoRE instance you would like to register. Open it and click on Register a browser, then enter the provided code below, and click Register to continue.

Please enter your login credentials below and click Log in. If you do not have an account, you can create one.
